Package org.wso2.carbon.identity.entitlement.endpoint.auth

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EntitlementAuthenticationHandler
    Interface to be implemented by any type of authentication handlers that will be registered to authenticate Entitlement requests coming to Entitlement REST endpoints.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicAuthHandler
    This is the default BASIC-Auth authentication handler for Entitlement REST Endpoints
    EntitlementAuthConfigReader
    Initiating authenticator classes
    EntitlementAuthenticatorRegistry
    This stores the authenticators registered for Entitlement REST endpoints and returns the appropriate authenticator as requested by authentication filter associated with Entitlement REST endpoints.
    OAuthHandler
    This is the default oAuth authentication handler for Entitlement REST Endpoints
    OAuthServiceClient
